duties_responsibilities.duty: Assist in the installation and maintenance of mechanical, electrical, plumbing, carpentry, and other building equipment and systems.
Repair building interiors such as doors, walls, and furnishings.
Perform tasks requiring less expertise independently related to the inspection, operation, maintenance, and repair of equipment and systems.
Handle hazardous materials and associated waste including replacing batteries in faucets and replacing burned out fluorescent lamps.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or GED equivalent
